text: The Lady Takes a Sailor is 1949 American romantic comedy movie directed by Michael Curtiz, and starring Jane Wyman, Eve Arden, Dennis Morgan, Robert Douglas, Allyn Joslyn, Tom Tully and Jack Lemmon. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: The Lady Takes a Sailor
